text: allah mattu avana dutara virud'dha yud'dha saridavarige mattu bhumiyalli asantiyannu habbalu henagaduvavarige iruva pratiphalavenendare, avarannu kollabeku athava silubegerisabeku athava avara kaigalannu hagu kalugalannu virud'dha kadegalalli (uda: Balagai mattu edakalu) kattarisabeku athava avarannu nadininda horagattabeku. Idu ihalokadalli avarigiruva apamana. Innu paralokadallantu avarigagi bhari hinse kadide
